ygData.subject: RE: Missed notes (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A friend of mine died in the Karana s, spawned back in Halas and proceeded to go through the Blackburrow tunnel on his way back and noticed his corpse in
ygData.messageBody:
> Actually they had the reader board going earlier
> stating that they knew that this problem was going
> on, but that it would not be fixed until monday
> morning. I hope that helps.

A friend of mine died in the Karana's, spawned back in Halas and proceeded
to go through the Blackburrow tunnel on his way back and noticed his corpse
in Blackburrow. Puzzled, he looted it and got all of his items back. He then
continued on his way to the Karana's to meet back up with his friends.
Suddenly he saw his corpse where he had actually died. Puzzled again he went
to loot it. Everything was there. Again. Now he has two of everything he
previously had. (He had no Lore items).

Wonder how many people got something nice like that. Seems that this latest
patch broke more things than it fixed. Last night it was raining, but there
was no rain. I haven't seen a Sand Giant in Ro or the Oasis all weekend.
There was a pack of no less than 30 Deep Water Goblin pets running around
with a Deep Water Goblin around the Oasis beaches and hills. You'd think
that Deepwater Goblin pets would stay in the Oasis lake with their masters;
but they've been running around the desert in the Oasis all weekend. Most
annoying since there's no way in Norrath I'm going to use an AE (Area
Effect) song with the risk of hitting one of those nasties.
